comprehensive_overview: Ply is a pure-Python implementation of the popular Lex and Yacc parsing tools. It is designed to simplify the process of writing lexers and parsers in Python, providing a high-level, object-oriented interface that makes it easy to define grammars directly in the code.
core_features:
1. Pure-Python implementation
2. Simplifies writing lexers and parsers in Python
3. High-level, object-oriented interface
4. Allows defining grammars directly in the code
